title: Microsoft Teams: LTI apps integration with Schoology LMS
description:
,Microsoft Teams and Schoology can help provide seamless experiences to teachers and students, with the integration of Teams Meetings LTI within Schoology’s LMS, educators and students can access, schedule, and manage Teams Meetings within the Schoology LMS. 
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/lti/teams-classes-and-meetings-with-schoology?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: September CY2022
Preview date: October CY2022
